definitions: the fact of being or consisting of one, or of being united as a whole

examples.text: the presbyterial and episcopal service is not humanly viable unless by rediscovering the unicity of the priesthood

shortDefinitions: fact of being or consisting of one, or of being united as whole

definitions: the fact or quality of being unique

examples.text: Aqina's novel doctrine of the unicity of forms

shortDefinitions: fact or quality of being unique
